org.simplity.kernel.comp

Class ComponentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.kernel.comp.ComponentManager

  • public class ComponentManager
extends Object
    Utility class with specific named methods rather than dipping into corresponding ComponentType methods
    Author:
    simplity.org

      • evaluate

        public static Value evaluate(String functionName,
                             Value[] valueList,
                             FieldsInterface data)
        evaluate a function and return its value
        Parameters:
        functionName - name of function
        valueList - array of arguments. Must match arguments of function in the right order. null or empty array if this function does not require any arguments
        data - fields context that may contain other fields that the function may refer at run time. This is typically the fields from serviceCOntext
        Returns:
        value is never null. However value.isNull() could be true.
        Throws:
        ApplicationError - in case the function is not defined, or you are passing wrong type of arguments for the function

      • getTestRun

        public static TestRun getTestRun(String caseName)
        get a test case
        Parameters:
        caseName -
        Returns:
        test case. not null
        Throws:
        ApplicationError - in case the testCase is not found.

      • getTestRunOrNull

        public static TestRun getTestRunOrNull(String caseName)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        test case, or null.
        Throws:
        ApplicationError - in case the testCase is not found.
